features: Quickly access the contents in your bag thanks to a pull tab opening
Easily access a phone and other small items in the stretch pocket on shoulder strap
Streamline your carry around town by removing the sternum strap and tucking the hipbelt behind back panel
Be seen in low light conditions thanks to light loop attachment point and re?ective material
Easily store and locate items in the internal mesh pocket
Stay cool with breathable back panel and shoulder straps
Stay hydrated with the dedicated hydration sleeve with drink tube exit port and two side water bottle pockets (hydration reservoir sold separately)
